channel.title: Who is faster for Whonix? KVM vs VirtualBox
channel.description: What is faster? KVM or VirtualBox? Windows 7 definitely faster in VirtualBox. What about Whonix?

item.title: Who is faster for Whonix? KVM vs VirtualBox
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
More in-depth graphics comaparisons are expected between the two this year.

However some benchmarks [1] in that article already show superior results for KVM.

[1] H.264 Video Encoding, Phong Rendering With Soft-Shadow Mapping

Vboxâ€™s new 3D GPU has very lackluster results and only covers extensions up to OpenGL 2.1

https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=virtualbox-60-vmsvga&num=1

Read full topic
item.source: Who is faster for Whonix? KVM vs VirtualBox

item.title: Who is faster for Whonix? KVM vs VirtualBox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
What about graphics? VirtualBox used to be a lot more snappy wrt to multimedia playback. Is this still the case or has changed?

Read full topic
